1101111111100111 0111101011100000 0 -> sum: 0101101011000111, cout: 1
0011001000111100 1101110100011011 1 -> sum: 0000111101011000, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
